title: The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly URINATES during a romantic date with Angie Kent - and they kiss after
text:
Angie Kent and Timm Hanly enjoyed a romantic date on Thursday night's episode of Bachelorette.

But the romantic moment was spoiled when the 27-year-old fireproofer decided to relieve himself right in the middle of a deep conversation.

Timm was talking about how he would care for Angie if she became disabled before he randomly said: 'Man, I really need to pee, aye!'

'I'm going to p**s my pants!' The Bachelorette's Timm Hanly (left) urinated during a romantic date with Angie Kent (right) - and they kissed right afterwards on Thursday night's episode

'I'm going to p**s aye, I'm going to p**s my pants,' Timm told producers as he walked away to relieve himself.

Angie burst out in laughter at Timm walking off in the middle of their date but found it endearing and genuine.

'He's off taking a whiz! If there is one thing I know for sure, Timm is definitely here for me. I mean, he did not care that we are making a TV show. He just got up and took a whiz and I love it,' she said.

'He's taking a whiz!' Angie burst out in laughter at Timm walking off in the middle of their date but found it endearing and genuine

Random! 'I'm going to p**s aye, I'm going to p**s my pants,' Timm told producers as he walked away to relieve himself

Prior to this, he was holding an umbrella to shield himself and Angie from the rain, which may have spurred on the need to urinate.

When Timm returned, the pair continued their conversation before Angie decided to gift the hunk a rose, securing his place at the rose ceremony.

The couple then shared a steamy make-out session to celebrate their budding romance.

Cute! When Timm returned, the pair continued their conversation before Angie decided to gift the hunk a rose, securing his place at the rose ceremony

It's on! The couple then shared a steamy make-out session to celebrate their budding romance

I hope he washed his hands! Timm gripped Angie tightly during their passionate kiss

The make-out action didn't stop there with the pair rather scandalously sharing a kiss at the cocktail party in front of the other suitors.

'How do you feel about the boys tonight that will not get a chat and you've had a whole day with her?' Adam Sellers asked Timm after the kiss.

The fireproofer boldly replied: 'Every single person has the same 24 hours in a day, it's how you use your 24 hours that separates the winners from the losers.'

The Bachelorette continues Wednesday at 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: Angie Kent and Timm Hanly enjoyed a romantic date on Thursday night's episode of Bachelorette.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
